Ennica Mukomberanwa (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1978) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe
Nwa nwanyị Grace Mukomberanwa na Nicholas Mukomberanwa, ọgbọ mbụ nke ihe ọkpụkpụ zụrụ ya
A na-egosipụta ọrụ ya na nchịkọta onwe ya na ụlọ ngosi gburugburu ụwa. Ọ bụ ọgbọ nke atọ nke Zimbabwean sculptor
N'afọ 2004, e nyere ya ihe nrite nke nyere ya ohere ịga Stockholm, Copenhagen, Scotland, na Canada
Ọ bụ onye otu ezinụlọ Mukomberanwa nke ndị na-akpụ ihe

Ọ bụ nwa Grace Mukomberanwa na Nicholas Mukomberanwa, onye jere ozi dị ka onye ndụmọdụ ya.  Ọ bụ nwanne nwanyị nke ndị na-akpụ ihe bụ Anderson, Netsai, Taguma, Tendai Mukomberanwa nakwa Lawrence Mukomberanwa, na nwa nwanne nne ya bụ Nesbert Mukomberanwa.

Ọrụ ya na-elekwasị anya n'omenala nke Shona bịakwa na-emepụta obere ụkpụrụ ọ bụ ezie na o mepụtara ọtụtụ ndị buru ibu. Ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe na International Sculpture symposium' nke Andres Institute of Art na New Hampshire, CT mere n'afọ 2014 ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nkume granite.
Koleji agụmakwụkwọ ya bụ na agụmakwụkwọ na akụ na ụba mmadụ.
